meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amy Stephenson Daniel Hodge Betsy Schroeder Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6292.

td.p: Amy Stephenson, a writer and editor from Sunnyside, New York
Daniel Hodge, an actuary from Charlotte, North Carolina
Betsy Schroeder, a graduate student of veterinary medicine from Blacksburg, Virginia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,200)

tr.td: AVIATION FIRSTS
STATE SONGS
(Alex: You have to name the state, of course.)
YOU MIGHT "B" HUNGRY
(Alex: In honor of his birthday today, a whole category dedicated to...)
MUHAMMAD ALI AT 70
(Alex: We're dealing with numerals in...)
ORDINALLY SPEAKING
NORMAN INVASION

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the English Channel

Daniel
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1909 Louis Bleriot became the first person to fly a plane across this body of water between the U.K. & France')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1909 Louis Bleriot became the first person to fly a plane across this body of water between the U.K. & France

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', '"They say home is where the heart is, these green mountains are my home"')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: "They say home is where the heart is, these green mountains are my home"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_1', 'clue_J_3_1_stuck', '[Alex pronounced "Bros" as "Brothers".]

bagels

Daniel
')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Einstein Bros & Noah's are chains that specialize in these round breakfast items--do you want some shmear?

toggle('clue_J_5_1', 'clue_J_5_1_stuck', '(Daniel: What is 5th Avenue?)

7th Avenue

DanielAmy
')

a Zeppelin

')

')

toggle('clue_J_6_2', 'clue_J_6_2_stuck', '(Daniel: What is New Mexico?)

')

South Dakota

')

(Alex: No that\'s non-commissioned. We\'re talking about commissioned officers, [*] is the lowest.)

Second Lieutenant

Betsy
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Betsy
Daniel
Amy

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Betsy
Daniel
Amy
NORWAY'S CULTURE & HISTORY
LEGAL MATTERS
I PLAYED A DOCTOR & SOME OTHER GUY ON TV
CLASSICAL MUSIC
POSSESSIVE BOOK TITLES
"TRI" TIPS

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew sits at a kitchen table in Oslo, Norway.) A trip to Norway wouldn\'t be complete without sampling lefse, the potato staple that folk legends say was given to slain warriors of this hall, to fortify them for battle')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew sits at a kitchen table in Oslo, Norway.) A trip to Norway wouldn't be complete without sampling lefse, the potato staple that folk legends say was given to slain warriors of this hall, to fortify them for battle

tr.td: From the Latin latro, "robber", it's the nonviolent crime of stealing personal property, like money

About 30 stave churches from the 12th and 13th century still stand here in Norway. The four corner posts, or staves, may represent these first four books of the New Testament')

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_1_3', 'clue_DJ_1_3_stuck', '(Sarah of the Clue Crew stands before a tall sculpture in the Vigelund Sculpture Garden in Oslo, Norway.) The centerpiece of Oslo\'s Vigelund Sculpture Garden is a 57-foot tower depicting intertwined human figures reaching to the heavens; it\'s known as this, from Latin for made from a single stone')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah of the Clue Crew stands before a tall sculpture in the Vigelund Sculpture Garden in Oslo, Norway.) The centerpiece of Oslo's Vigelund Sculpture Garden is a 57-foot tower depicting intertwined human figures reaching to the heavens; it's known as this, from Latin for made from a single stone

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
